creditline: Gift of Gerald Ray Nelson and Joanne Hogan Nelson
description: man seated on a rock, wearing a black coat and knickers with patterned trimmings, patterned cap and glasses, resting his hands on a cane, talking to a standing elf wearing a tall pointed cap and long pointed shoes; three elves behind tree at top; foliage, ULC
provenance: The artist; his stepdaughter, Joanie Nelson, Vancouver, WA
title: Encounter with Elves
